definitions.text: salty fluid secreted by sweat glands

examples: he's in a sweat about exams

definitions.text: condensation of moisture on a cold surface
examples: the cold glasses were streaked with sweat

definitions.text: use of physical or mental energy; hard work
examples: he got an A for effort
they managed only with great exertion

definitions.text: excrete perspiration through the pores in the skin
